trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Harvene is dreading her next journey into the woods.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the peeling bark to Harvene.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_001<tab>Ah, you are one of Master Matoya's guests, are you not? Perhaps you can assist me.

TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_002<tab>To the west of here, in Lake Tusi Mek'ta, sits a tree which cradles an enormous crystal─Fruit of the Protector. It is said to have existed even before the empire of Ronka.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_003<tab>I require the bark from this tree and I would ask you to retrieve it for me.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_004<tab>I must make dye for our clothes, you see, and it is a most vital ingredient.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_005<tab>As you might expect, eaters and all manner of beasts are drawn to its power. Were the woods not so rife with danger I would go myself.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_006<tab>Please say you will help. I require but four pieces of bark to finish my work.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_010<tab>Do be careful when peeling the bark, lest you damage the tree.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_030<tab>Ah, you are returned. Were you able to reach the tree?

TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_031<tab>Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, thank you! I realize it looks like ordinary bark at a glance, but it makes for such wondrous colors when properly ground and mixed.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_032<tab>Garments dyed using the bark from that tree are said to be blessed by the Protector, you know.
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_033<tab>Mark my words: every guard in Slitherbough will be dressed from head to toe in clothes using my dye. Perhaps even the children and the elderly!
TEXT_LUCKZE006_03440_HARVENE_000_034<tab>I better set to boiling this bark. If you'll excuse me.
